dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: Before you become a hero, you must learn how to use your spray to slay the sewer monsters.

dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: They are made out of paint.

dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: You can slay them by painting over them with the OPPOSITE color.

dialogue.name: Maggie
dialogue.line: For example, if a monster is Yellow (Red + Green), you should spray it with Blue.
